@IOHK_Charles @breitwoman @zmanian @_jillruth I chose not be paid upfront, and you called that "greedy". Tezos actually delivered a live proof of stake network, something Cardano has yet to do.  I wish you best of luck with the Sfitfung, but your behavior during our ordeal was despicable and cowardly. Shame on you.

Crypto Foundations (a la Ethereum, Tezos, Cardano, Filecoin, DFinity) should have vesting schedules like a for-profit. People creating something and leaving immediately is a misaligned incentive structure.

@breitwoman @zmanian @_jillruth "The Cardano Foundation is an independent legal entity governed by its council, thus the Cardano community, IOHK and Emurgo cannot force the chairman to resign."  @IOHK_Charles described the independence of the Tezos foundation as a "stupid" "cloistered emperor arrangement".

Wow, I just realized, Tezos and Cardano are such similar projects  - Similar proof of stake designs - Heavy focus on formally verifiable smart contracts and VM design - Written in functional programming languages - Coin holder voting based governance - And now foundation drama 😮
